metadata.scenario: Technical support for a malfunctioning device

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, my wireless earbuds aren't charging properly anymore. This is so frustrating, they're pretty new.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your earbuds. I can definitely help you troubleshoot that. Could you please tell me the model of your earbuds and what specifically happens when you try to charge them?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: They're the 'SoundFlow Pro' model. When I put them in the charging case and plug the case in, the lights just flash inconsistently, or sometimes don't light up at all. They were working fine yesterday.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing the model. Flashing or inconsistent lights usually indicate a charging issue. First, please try using a different charging cable and power adapter, if possible, to rule out those accessories.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I tried a different cable and block from my phone, both of which I *know* work. Same problem. The case seems completely unresponsive sometimes. Is it possible the charging port on the case itself is just dead? It hasn't even been dropped or gotten wet!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: While port failure is a possibility, it's less common. Before concluding that, let's attempt a hard reset of the earbuds and the case. Instructions vary by model, but typically involve holding down a button on the case for 10-15 seconds while the earbuds are inside. Please refer to your user manual for the specific steps for the SoundFlow Pro.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: A hard reset? I don't even know where my manual is! Can you just tell me how to do it for this model? It feels like I'm just going in circles here.
